title: Spring Edition
description: Includes spring based textures to theme your Minecraft experience

title: Blue UI Addon (WIP)
description: A nice new fancy blue UI for Love and Tolerance, also works great with any other texture pack

title: Optifine Addon
description: Adds connected textures and variants with Optifine

title: 3D Models Addon (WIP)
description: Includes the custom 3d models for the pack

title: Classic Textures Addon
description: Includes any of the original textures of the pack with variants for vanilla and Optifine

title: Bronydog Textures Addon
description: Includes some alternative textures and GUI done by Bronydog

title: Alt Door Addon
description: Includes an alternative set of textures for some of the doors

title: 3D Alt Door Addon
description: Includes the alt door textures with custom 3d models
